nodes.text: True Believers: Star Wars Covers 1 is a one-shot comic book issue published by Marvel Comics as part of its True Believers budget reprint program, which reprints popular comic titles for the suggested retail price of $1. Star Wars Covers 1 was released on May 4, 2016—Star Wars Day—along with nine other titles. Unlike the other 2016 Star Wars Day True Believers titles, Star Wars Covers 1 instead collects cover art of previously published Star Wars issues.
